desc:
Active: Overwhelm - Stuns a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 60 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
notes:
The stun is melee range.
Doesn't stack with other bashes.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
attrib:
+ 85 Damage
+ 10 Strength
BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25%
BASH RANGED CHANCE:10%
BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4
BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 60
OVERWHELM STUN DURATION: 2
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
